name: Start with Nothing - Ludum Dare 45
description:
In this game, your civilization starts on an empty world. Build up your society with items that you get randomly each turn.

Houses - You need these for your people to live in. NOTE: If your house doesn't have a water connection, the people will die!

Lake - A body of water to connect a water pump to.

Water Pump - Attaches to a lake, allows for 2 water connections to be made.

Water Connection - Gives water to a house or oil well, allowing people to live.

Oil Well - Can be a home for people, generates Industry Points which can be spent to get a non-random item.
